nodes.bodyText: This was a very critical log line for debugging in GAE logs. The change is also entirely unrelated to the PR. Please revert this.
OK. It's an annoyance locally and doesn't give me much context about what was going on. I thought it was just leftover and tried to clean it up.
Is it supposed to fire every minute?

No, though it might if you have local UI  tab open that's polling your API server. If you paste the logs you observed, I can try and answer. The log line is expected to run on every authenticated request.
